lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: Retired Math Teacher and policy analyst
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand to others in need. I appreciate the opportunity Kiva, and its founders, have given all of us.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired person, I founded the Kiva lenders Kennedy Fund and manage this committee. I also work to improve health care for uninsured individuals in my community.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It's a positive joyfull project!!

lender.name: Janet and her class
lender.loan_because: we want to support Meagan's new baby girl by making this loan on her behalf.

lender.name: Brian
lender.whereabouts: Notre Dame de l'Ile Perrot QC

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to and I can. My family is blessed with a strong circle of caring and love. Passing along some of that so others can experience the pride of accomplishment is an easy choice.
lender.occupational_info: helping young people and families in trouble

lender.name: Phillip J. Suver, M.D.
lender.occupational_info: In memory of my father, Phililp J. Suver, M.D. 1923- 2003

lender.name: The Dude
lender.loan_because: This is a cool idea. I wish I had discovered this web site sooner. I work two jobs so I know what it takes to try and get ahead. I wish all those requesting loans the very best of luck.
lender.occupational_info: During the week I work for an oil exploration company and on some weekends I drive a limo around the Houston area.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to remote areas like Kenya, Guatemala, Belize, Mexico, and have seen first hand some of the needs that some people have. If I can make one person get closer to their goal, that's just amazing!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a T.V. personality, similar to a VJ. I currently work on Telemundo, a show called Descontrol. It airs Sat's at 1pm.

lender.name: chelsea
lender.loan_because: I enjoy serving others

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Every single person has the ability to help someone else. I am grateful to be a small part of this global network of lending.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I want to use my money prosperously and generously. I am a small entreprenuer myself. and I love this idea!
lender.occupational_info: I help people fulfill their dreams. I never give up on them and I believe that they can do anything!

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: As a mother I feel connected to other mothers everywhere, and want a better life for all of our children.
lender.occupational_info: I study, teach and write poetry.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a great idea!

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: giving people a chance to develop their business will make them a greater contributor to society. Business owners demand effective government. I view ineffective governemnt as the greatest obstacle for moving out of poverty in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I invest individuals savings into public companies. I invest in companies that I believe will be successful.

lender.name: Kaitlyn
lender.loan_because: At eighteen sometimes I feel the difference I make in the world is limited. Knowing that I can help someone across the world acheive their dreams gives me hope that someone in the future will help me acomplish my dreams aswell. Karma all the way, the world is a beautiful place.

lender.name: hugo el clamor latinrock
lender.loan_because: I need to produce and create a music,independed company records to produce many latin rock music,proyects here in colombia like shakira or juanes with my band el clamor,and others and sell millons copys and help much people around the world,and create concerts to preserve and care the earth. and bring to much jobs in concerts ,touring.and help fundations around the world with my music and proyects
lender.occupational_info: create latin rock pop music,make productions,record music,make concerts touring and help and cooperate with the music in festivals and campgnes ,foundations

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives. Alone, I could not afford to make a difference, but together with other people, the impact is huge! After traveling to some developing countries and seeing the poverty, I decided to find a way to help someone change their life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach special education at a public high school.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: What is such a small amount in the US, can make such a huge difference elsewhere. I'm not rich by any stretch of the imagination so it certainly makes me feel good that I can help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: When a government buys our software, I help them learn the best ways to use it. I also manage the people that train the client on how to use the software.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing and I can.
"I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil." - RFK

lender.name: Bevin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of those who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: My work consists of providing the best care and opportunities for my family to succeed in life. To me this is much more than education and financlal success but the success of being a whole person that lives outside of thier small personal world and encompasses all those in the world around them.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can't think of anything better than helping someone achieve a dream and improve their lives and those lives around them. What an opportunity for me - the small amount I can afford can have a meaningful affect on people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small nonprofit agency that provides rights protection and advocacy for quality of life and care to seniors, disabled persons and people with mental health needs.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Wonderful people around the world are working hard to change lives. I support those who are in a position of educating others or providing pharmaceuticals in order to lower the world's population
lender.occupational_info: Parent Education and Personal Growth Trainer

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that children get safely to and from school. I'm a widower now raising 2 of my 4 grandchildren (ages 6 & 8). It's challenging but very satisfying.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone with their goals as people have helped with mine.
lender.occupational_info: To share the underwater world!

lender.name: elizabeth nirbhebe
lender.loan_because: It makes sense, It's one way to help, I like it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and an alternative therapies practitioner/healer modalities include: Old Ways Healing, Reiki, Shiatsu, Tui Na, Sat Nam Rasayan, Taiji-5 Element Medical Qi Gong, Kundalini Yoga, Yoga for Youth and Yoga Plus, Early Childhood Special Education and Parent Education licensed, KRI Certified and AOBTA Certified.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: There is nothing like the feeling of giving and knowing you're directly helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Currently a Fitness Consultant and Personal Trainer in hopes to make a difference in the lives of others. Working on my M.S. degree specializing in low back pain biomechanics.

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: I like to give people the opportunity to get ahead of the game. Microfinancing works really well for this. I especially like the Kiva model, because the loan amount goes directly to the borrower, with the least possible portion of the loan getting "lost" en route to the borrower.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in becoming strong, and independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychotherapist specializing in The Psychology of Women which focuses on the roles that we play, the transitions we make between these roles, and how they affect the way we think and feel about ourselves.

lender.name: Sally
lender.occupational_info: I teach year 12 English, Literature, Psychology & History to students who are not in main-stream schooling.

lender.name: Jo-Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance. It only takes a small amount to make such a positive impact on someone's life.

lender.name: jerry
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone and everyone, given the opportunity, can succeed and if there are people out there that need opportunities to help their own or other's situations, then they are worthy of help.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: I Am Rick
lender.loan_because: I Can... Call it "Pay It Forward", or Positive Karma, but giving it good, it allows us to prosper in Peace & Love.
lender.occupational_info: Transaction Coordinator, I put people and things together.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone wants a better life for their children than they have themselves and opportunities shouldn't be limited on the arbitrary basis of where a person is born.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with a disability to find ways to make it easier carry out their daily living activities and minimise the impact of their disability on their quality of life.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: to help people better themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer in the manufacturing industry.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It is fun to think that my humble loan is making a difference to someone across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair aircraft

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to help others with the same funds over and over.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance, and I think micro lending is a great way to create a positive change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the installation of solar systems to help people get their energy from the sun.

lender.name: melisma
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: tomohiko
lender.occupational_info: business computer system engineer

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I enjoy feeling connected in a help-giving way to women around the globe. At 61 loans and counting, I just might be making a difference!

lender.name: Nilay
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i help people with seizures (epilepsy) and other problems with their brain or nerves.

lender.name: Michael J. 2008edition
lender.loan_because:
. Humanity is a disgrace. Our political systems squander wealth & opportunity. Our spiritual doctrines lead us astray. We educate our children to be blind.
The Kiva borrowers give me hope. Because they're fighting back. They don't accept that they're too small to be taken seriously; that women shouldn't succeed without masculine guidance; that school is only for the children of the privileged.
The Kiva entrepreneurs are creating change that is beyond the control of established socio-economic models. My hope is that those changes they create will make us uncomfortable.
Its a gift to be part of this. .
lender.occupational_info:
I put words and pictures together. Web sites, newspapers, book covers, magazines, posters, signs, slides, invitations, business cards, food labels, logos, flyers, calendars, CD covers...
Its all graphics. Go to museums, listen to your art teacher, take chances. There's a lot to art.

lender.name: Idell
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for our state agency that works to protect the environment. I am now retired.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I hope to set a good example for my daughter by helping other mothers in need.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help build bridges from poverty to abundant life.

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: Too much of what we hear about the rest of our world are impersonal facts and figures. This allows us to translate them into real people who share the same hopes we all have.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: victor
lender.occupational_info: I OWN A FEW SALES COMPANIES

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lender.occupational_info: I am given a gift of management ability. I try to build bridges for others to pass from poverty to dignity.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: I believe ordinary people, both lenders and borrowers, can still make an important difference in this world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am a strong believer in the concept that one man can make a difference. This is one way for me to make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: My company, Training Days, provides training and consultancy to pharmaceutical and biotech companies, primarily regarding clinical research.

lender.name: Jeroly
lender.loan_because: I have some extra funds that I want to be put to good use
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to secondary school students

lender.name: fabrizio
lender.occupational_info: major national bank, responsible for treasury applications

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of helping peole wo are actively working to make their lifes better themselves. This way they can follow their own idea of what they need. As it costs me almost nothing to lend, it is only the gesture that I gave them, the rest they achieve themselves and they are no "benfit-victims". I admire them working so hard at such diffucult conditions!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I need capital fund for demonstrating the art of earning in agriculture.
lender.occupational_info: I am working for my community for the development of their living by working in the field of agriculture. I would like to make them practical knowledge by showing them how to cultivate a productive fruits and vegetables in their cultivate land.

lender.name: The Girls
lender.occupational_info: We are a very close group of girlfriends. We have been friends for many many years. We are very pleased to be able to make a contribution to the needs of our world.

lender.name: Jo-Lyn & Christian
lender.loan_because: We can only hope that we have each other to lean on when times are their lowest. It is up to each of us to lend a hand to another.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: Within our common world we should share & care. The way even poor people support entrepreneurs at kiva.org is simply amazing. Help the people to help theirselves.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: As I view and hear about the rampant destruction of human existence and the natural resources that should be available to everyone, I am disheartened and feel a little helpless in making a difference. But, through Kiva we can help turn feelings of hopelessness into feelings of empowerment, destruction into a new genesis, and hate and distrust into bonds of friendship. These feelings are not only for those who are being helped financially, but for us who can be of some small assistance to help our fellow men and women around the world (1 Timothy 6:17-19)

lender.name: guy
lender.loan_because: I can and I really believe in this model of charity.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Regional Health Information Organization that enables stakeholders to share patient health information electronically in order to reduce medical errors, improve patient care, and improve overall health.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I believe every dollar can make a difference. Someone once did this to help me get started.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients with all aspects of financial management and trustworthy advice.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe capital can change lives.

lender.name: Steve, Casey & Naomi
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our daughter the importance of giving back in life. We want her to see that the smallest efforts can have big effects.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is a police officer, Casey is a stay at home mom and Naomi is a thriving 4 year old.

lender.name: Cari
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice to a government agency that helps people prepare for and recover from major emergencies, whether natural or man-made.

lender.name: Alfredo
lender.loan_because: I need to pay inmediate debts

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: We are our brothers keepers. Only when our world unites under the umbrella of compassion will the suffering of so many be eliminated.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and world cultures to 15-18 year old students.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I like reaching out one-to-one to the world and repairing damage done to world's perception of America and Americans.
lender.occupational_info: I write and produce TV shows of all kinds - comedies, dramas, and documentaries.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I don't have much to give, so this way I can do more with what I have.

lender.name: Niles and Janet
lender.loan_because: We believe everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Janet is a nurse that works with new moms and their babies. Niles buys and sells older homes

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: MBA Candidate at George Washington University
lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.name: Larry and Carla
lender.loan_because: On August 29, 2005 we lost everything to Katrina and this is a wonderful venue to be able to give back, a helping hand up...not a hand out .

lender.name: peter nyaga
lender.loan_because: we r one big family, & should assist where we can 2 make our planet better than we found it. its a blessing 2 give, than receive,

lender.name: Boston women that Rock
lender.loan_because: We decided to group together and loan to women who need help and that for so littlle we hope we can help support and change these womens life's in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of working women that realize how hard it is to raise familys and support a family. We have all been blessed and want to give back

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: KIVA loans are a great way to help make a dent in world-wide poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Manage computers and networks.

lender.name: Raphael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people (when I can. Thanks to KIVA !).
lender.occupational_info: I play the piano and I teach children of my village to discover their abilities to play music.

lender.name: konstantinos
lender.loan_because: just because...
lender.occupational_info: I work on wastewater treatment and environmental projects

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way I can help out someone who's trying to make it in a difficult part of the world. I especially like to help out those entrepreneurs who are farming.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small insurance agency in Colorado. We help businesses and individuals with their health insurance needs.

lender.name: CCTPA
lender.loan_because: The preponderance of evidence seems to support the idea that microfinance is an efficient means of alleviating poverty and providing much-needed opportunities for entrepreneurs in developing economies.
lender.occupational_info: The Canadian Center for Technology and Public Accountability (CCTPA) is an organization whose aim is to serve as a clearinghouse for information and resources regarding the use of existing and emergent technologies in the service of public accountability. The CCTPA is a Montreal-based non-profit organization established in 2009.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to do more
lender.occupational_info: Numbers, Number and more numbers.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in that I was born into a loving family with wonderful opportunities for me to succeed. I think that it is right to give some of my good fortune toward helping those that need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I love technology and programming. I try to learn all I can about computers and ways of furthering knowledge and innovation.

lender.name: Massood
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Canadian lawyer [specializing in Immigration Law]

lender.name: Rick & Soosie
lender.loan_because: A little here is a lot there. Bang for your buck!

lender.name: Riitta
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. I also appreciate the possibility to see where the money goes and how it will help individuals. I choose businesses run by women, because I believe that through women I can also help the future generations.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Iimplementar an office to work on General Service
lender.occupational_info: My work is dedicated to providing services in general, whether in computer work as for various businesses and homes. I dedicate this work as joy of technical knowledge in general, whether in computer, electronic, mechanical, engineering. Etc.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: capitalist with a conscience. "teach a man to fish..."
lender.occupational_info: wealth management/advisory services for a global private banking and asset management firm

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I love the creative process behind starting and running a business and I love that I can help someone else get started.

lender.name: antoinette
lender.loan_because: i really like to support women who want to create income for their children and their community

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I take decisions!

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping at a personal level and knowing exactly what good the money accomplishes.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain computer systems.

lender.name: Venkatesh
lender.loan_because: I believe in the saying..."Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach/Help him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lender.name: Blen
lender.loan_because: I am an Ethiopian and can appreciate how a little bit of help can go a long way. I'm also a fervent entrepreneur and enjoy encouraging it in others, especially in women.

lender.name: MIsty
lender.occupation: CEO/Executive Director of a non-profit organizatio
lender.loan_because: How could I not?! It's the right thing to do! Everyone deserves the chance to make something of themselves!

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I have a comfortable life, perhaps I can make others a little more comfortable too.

lender.name: Clare & Tim
lender.loan_because: I wake up every morning determined to both change the world and have one hell of a good time. Sometimes this makes planning the day a little difficult.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share those blessings.

lender.name: Anna C
lender.loan_because: I care!!!
lender.occupational_info: Geographer...researching health and urbanization in West Africa

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I've needed help to reach my goals, and I want to help others reach theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze my company's data to find trends and opportunities for improvement.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people, not just once, but over and over again. Hopefully this will really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Work in the aerospace industry.

lender.name: Danke8
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in breaking the poverty cycles.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry. Software has changed the modern world.

lender.name: Gregor
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best instruments for the development of small business in rural countries.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the owner and managing director of a private equity company, specialized in corporate finance for industries.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I love what I do. I want more people around the world to discover the joy of owning their own business.
lender.occupational_info: As a Mobile Notary, I offer Notary services and document preparation services in customers homes, offices, hospital rooms, nursing facility or any location convenient for the customer. I am available 24/7 by appointment for all notarial needs.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: Helping others fulfill their dreams is a worthwhile venture. I understand the struggles of owning a business and it is a great feeling to be able to make even a small difference to others from all around the globe.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I feel like our current economic system has been created to function only when some people are forced to do without- without a job, home, health care or even potable water- and as a consequence, without hope. I can't live in that kind of World without trying to do something, however small, to make a difference. I admire these entrepreneurs who are taking the risk and working to better their lives, and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I worked formally in Airline IT.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I'm in need for a loan for 700.00. I am trying to open a childcare facility, but I don't have the funds. I have been working in childcare for 11 years and i'm ready to pursur my dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am very successful in what I do. I love children and I give them the best love and care.

lender.name: Lee Ali
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every day in order to gain an education that will stick with me the rest of my life.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: It is the culmination of years of goodwill, unleashed by the power of KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I bridge gaps in understanding... between people (via language) or within the business world (technical vs. business needs).

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: A helping hand up is so much more than just a handout

lender.name: Sherry & Charlie
lender.loan_because: We have traveled the world, and appreciate how lucky we are. Doing my part to help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Ingoal
lender.loan_because: I loan because although I don't have much, I still have a lot more than many people across the globe...so instead of spending it on some random stuff, I thought that it would be a good idea to give ppl a chance...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of software engineering...

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is to struggle. I battle everyday with a sick husband. I want to make a difference and help someone in some way. I know what it is like to worry about the next meal, is the electric going to get turned off or will I have gas to get the kids to school. The chance to help someone in another country where the little I can spare would and could change someones life helps me to get through the day and realize my life could be much much worse!!! Ameicans and other countries have the spare change to change others lives. They only need pennies a day to make a HUGE difference!!!!!!!!!!!! I especially want to help single mothers and women who have sick husbands or children or who have lost their husbands.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's an effective way to get money to people who can improve their lives and their communities.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: People need help.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I can, and those who can, should. I thank Matt, Premal, and everyone else at Kiva who have made it not only possible, but incredibly easy for one person to extend a helping hand to another regardless of the distance that may separate the two.

lender.name: Wild Boar & Little Bird
lender.loan_because: Heavenly Father has been so generous to me.

lender.name: Mike & Peggy
lender.loan_because: We love helping others around the world.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have so much respect for those seeking the loans. I am humbled by the work ethic I see from Kiva participants.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the United States military.

lender.name: Jan & Hans-Jurgen
lender.loan_because: ...if not me then who?
lender.occupational_info: "I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy." - Rabindranath Tagore

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and the best way to show my gratitude is to share what I have with someone else.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because:
I believe this states it best...
"Gani paid off his loan recently. He and his wife feel very happy with the loan that changed their life to be better than before."

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: my brother gave me a gift certificate. But it's a cool cause, so I am learning about it and enjoying helping.
lender.occupational_info: I run a professional golf tournament that brings millions of dollars to the region and helps creates thousands of jobs.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to barely be able to meet the most basic needs of your family, and I believe in the power of people to act in positive ways to change their circumstances for the better. I am grateful to those who helped me to become successful in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I use a microscope to detect various cancerous and pre-cancerous diseases.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I have faith in the entrepreuneurial skills of others.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small manufacturing company.

lender.name: Erin and Luis
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I know the joy of building a business and I'm happy to help others in this process.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I trust this hand to hand net

lender.name: sean
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to give someone a little 'push' to help them get going.
lender.occupational_info: Always looking for the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I hope that by helping individuals build their own businesses helping themselves, helping their families and maybe also local communities
lender.occupational_info: I help people with depression and anxiety and other emotional problems

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the U.S. military.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Those that take a risk to get a better life deserve the chance to succeed.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: it's my way to make a change.
lender.occupational_info: I write learning materials for people who want to study English.

lender.name: The Rash Family
lender.loan_because: It makes us happy to help others succeed.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: Equipment operator in Alaska mine.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. And it makes me happy to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor, former editor for the British Medical Journal in London, and am now back in the US, looking to return to clinical work. I am an American and avidly interested in helping others get on their feet, emotionally and financially. I am an entrepreneur myself, and love seeing people working hard to better their lives as I try to do this myself.

lender.name: Cara & Kira
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who want to create a good life for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for 'Doctors Without Borders' (NGO) in the Public Health Department from where we support worldwide medical emergency programs.

lender.name: Reese Cup
lender.loan_because: I like to see someone smile even for a second. Its worth having friends and business partners across the globe, helping one another, receiving tremendous blessings from such relationships.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant for private individuals who are seeking private funding for their projects.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: My real work is to help the world be a better place. What I do during the day makes it so I can help others.

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: It works !!!

lender.name: John and Sue
lender.loan_because: Since we have been so blessed, we must share with others.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired so we spend a good deal of our time using our talents for the good of others.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I've lived and worked in developing nations of Asia and Africa for over 30 years and I well know the value of micro-financing. Kiva has impressed me as a unique and innovative way of taping into the huge population of interested and concern people in the 'Developed' countries of the world and linking them thru the internet with the aspirations and goals of real people and real activities that promise to have a positive impact. I'm looking forward to long and worthwhile relationship and involvement with KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: During my professional career I focused on designing, implementing, monitoring and assessing donor funded projects at all levels of society in the developing regions of the world. I've retired now from my official role but wish to continue to stay involved in what I consider to be some of the most important work in the world today.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: All adults want to be independent, but they often need a little help to get there.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for 34 years.

lender.name: LiewCF
lender.loan_because: Helping people is the best way to make yourselves happy
lender.occupational_info: Malaysia full-time blogger, son, husband, tech gadget lover, geek, social media fan, Mac user, Windows troubleshooter. Photographer wannabe.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: golden rule
lender.occupational_info: technical representative for a pacemaker company and work with doctors and patients.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Kiva just seems like a good idea.

lender.name: Sabina
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility to help out when I can with what I have. The people that are profiled here have a cause and purpose that they believe in and I believe in it too and in them. They're willing to work to achieve their objectives. I want to be a part of their success.
lender.occupational_info: I am student at McGill in Montreal, Canada. I am currently completing an MBA.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to make a difference

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Empowering those who are disadvantaged by whatever circumstance, especially women, is key to bringing sanity to our global community.
lender.occupational_info: Early retired, early unretired cancer survivor, now back into tunnel construction; currently a fifteen km x 3m dia. sewer tunnel for York Region, Ontario, Canada; four EPB TBMs and loads of challenges; Construction Manger, Southeast Collector Team, Hatch Mott MacDonald and Aecom, 110 Copper Creek Drive, Markham, Ontario, Canada

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help those that want to make the world a better place and because I had help when I needed it and can now help others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy/sell stocks, bonds, cds, mutual funds, etc. I am training to become a financial assistant.

lender.name: lindy
lender.loan_because: I can. We should

lender.name: Sepideh
lender.loan_because: For a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in a hi-tech company manufacturing and selling chips (semiconductors),

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is one of the best and most sustainable ways to empower hard-working entrepreneurs in the developing world to break the cycle of poverty and thrive in self reliance

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I like to share.
lender.occupational_info: I teach about the history of the United States and Psychology.

lender.name: MIchelle
lender.loan_because: I feel like I'm helping others in some small way. Also, I would hope that if I were in need, then someone would help me out.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to others' pursuits of happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a program that chemical manufacturers can choose to participate in. It will help them be environmentally responsible and provide safe jobs for their community.

lender.name: Irene and Paul
lender.loan_because: my husband Paul (from Sierra Leone) and I want to help empower women in memory of his most wonderful mother, Martha.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: 1. It makes me feel good. 2. I want to help people help themselves. 3. I think this is a great way to do something meaningful to improve the lives of other people.
lender.occupational_info: My daytime job enables me to do what I truly enjoy in my spare time, which is to sing. My fiance and I perform occasionally in local restaurants and coffeehouses.

lender.name: Ed Kohler
lender.loan_because: I can see where my money goes, and I've successfully seen it repaid so I could re-lend it.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses improve their websites so they can make more money.

lender.name: Jason & Liisa
lender.loan_because: I like to do my part to directly help people around the world improve their lives. I love being able to give money directly to individuals all around the world without bureaucracy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with and manage websites.

lender.name: Fred F. Taylor
lender.loan_because: I read about this program in President Clinton's book, "Giving", and this is the perfect opportunity for me to help the "least ones".
lender.occupational_info: I am an open, transparent, and honest man. I am a citizen of planet earth.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: through Kiva you are able to see results at the personal level. Donations made through other fronts keep things impersonal and distant. With donations via Kiva you are impacting people's lives directly and immediately.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy! My husband and I lost one of our 6 children to cancer 5 years ago and we received a lot of support so now it is time to give back a little.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I just started our own trucking business. We bought our own truck about 1 year ago. My husband does the truck driving and I do the paperwork and taxes and take care of our 5 children.

lender.name: Guardiola Family
lender.loan_because: We help any person who wishes to become successful by their own effort.

lender.name: Mieke
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Together with a colleague, I coach a small team of 25 at the Nike European Logistics Center in Laakdal, Belgium.

lender.name: Jeremy and Laura
lender.loan_because: We love Jesus and want to serve Him by making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jeremy is a Youth Pastor who spends most of his time working with Jr and Sr High students in our church ministry. I am a full time mom and Preschool teacher. I love working with my students and it brings me so much joy to teach! Jeremy and I love to serve God by working with people and showing them His love. We have two wonderful children and we live on Long Island.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: Making positive connections throughout the world is a step towards world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of the money (incoming and outgoing) for the business that employs me.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in life and want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I make grants for a federal science agency

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Admire entrepreneurs and realizing most businesses are small and need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Manager of a cardboard box factory employing over 100 people.

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: I am excited by the opportunity to reach out to people across the world, and I hope that if I ever needed it, someone would do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I write scripts for movies, and I take care of my eight year old son. In a few months I will also have a daughter.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in human resources managment.

lender.name: Stoll/Negahban
lender.loan_because: We have enough to get by
lender.occupational_info: helping

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and because it is a very powerful way to help someone help themselves.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: in my small way I can help empower women around the world. I also think it is important to set an example for my two sons by showing them it is our duty to help and one person CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Administration and development of a community museum

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to

lender.name: eugene
lender.loan_because: I believe that no one should be denied an opportunity because of the lack of money. I was lucky enough to have had plenty of financial support through the years and I'd like to keep that support circling around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: We are all human.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student. I am studying International Studies with a concentration in Africa and the Middle East.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: I am doing my part in ending extreme poverty...

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I have been turned down for many business loans and know the frustation.

lender.name: Corry
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as a valuable method empowering small business owners and alleviating poverty in the devloping world.

lender.name: Marina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in the world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children to read, write and do Mathematics

lender.name: Ash
lender.loan_because: I like helping to make money grow on trees ;-)

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Who doesn't need help some times?

lender.name: Count Fidelio
lender.loan_because: Ich kann. (I can).

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I admire the courage and initiative of people who want to improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: We make software for homeopaths all over the world.

lender.name: Kaaren
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of ambitious people with big dreams out there! I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I ease the strain and tension of everyday life out of peoples muscles.

lender.name: tim
lender.loan_because: I like to watch money swirl about.
lender.occupational_info: I design and support business computer systems for self-storage facilities (lots of tiny garages for rent)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love this idea of helping others. My Mom requested that this is what she wanted for her birthday, that my brother and I donate to Kiva, and I truly think this is such an amazing gift to give!
lender.occupational_info: I source and recruit sales professionals

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I can support myself and am able to help others.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: "It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it." -Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: Computer Guy

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: "The Church is God's family in the world. In this family no one ought to go without the necessities of life." - Pope Benedict XVI, Deus Caritas Est

lender.name: Darwyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I support the work of entrepreneurs in the nations of the former Soviet Union

lender.name: M. L. de Zwart
lender.loan_because: I like the concept.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: "Some people want to ask God why he allows so much hardship in this world. I'm worried He might ask me the same question".
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for putting in the electrical wiring and connections of big industrial machines.

lender.name: Rosalie
lender.loan_because: compassion for struggling elderly entrepreneurs

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I feel gratification from helping others to stand on their own feet. They are then new helping hands lifting the worlds peoples out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help to design roads so that they preserve the earth and community, while helping people get around better.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: These people are doing all the work to improve their lives. All I have to do is contribute some small funds - which get reinvested indefinately. Not every problem can be solved through economics - but for the many that can, I want to do what's most effective and Kiva is it.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in someone's life. We all know that $50 means nothing here, but to someone in a 3RD world country, that is the difference between a bad life and a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I Drive a truck that has 18 wheels hauling consumer commodities from one business'es location to another for redistribution of the parcels.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: This is my birthday present this year from my husband. I have more than enough and can't think of a better gift than giving, to pay it forward.

lender.name: Heather and Andrew
lender.loan_because: We like the fact that we are helping an individual and not just donating to an organisation.

lender.name: Lori & Otis
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life

lender.name: Kamala
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world who weren't born with the opportunities I was lucky enough to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I audition people for television shows and films and help find the best person to fill each role.

lender.name: Per
lender.loan_because: Give people in the third world a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Hard working.

lender.name: ruth
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do!!!!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: Physician -- health care for adults with disabilities.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I mainly loan to African entrepreneurs, in particular to women. I hope to support their prosperity, independence and education. It's just another way to express my love for the peoples and cultures of Africa.

lender.name: Jesper-Max
lender.loan_because: Great idea, great possibility and hopefully the furthure

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: Porque tengo la posibilidad.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with export and marketing.

lender.name: Norgard family
lender.loan_because: Our family would like to help people, because we are fortunate to be in a position where we can. To give them a chance to earn themselves a better living. Not passive help, but active.
lender.occupational_info: We publish books

lender.name: babuji
lender.loan_because: i want develop my business to nation wide and international
lender.occupational_info: computer systems sales and services

lender.name: Marja
lender.loan_because: I want to help women succeed in business.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because:
Well, it's a bit of a clichÃ© but:
"Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for life."
We should all focus more on helping people to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Consultant - So my job is basicly to give other people advice about how to improve their business.

lender.name: Dannie
lender.loan_because:
I support Unicef and other organisations so they can do a good job for the very poor and not so strong people around the world. I do also believe that if we should have a chance to minimize poverty, and help the very poor people in this world it also has do be done through local entrepreneurs that have the energy and fighting instincts to try and build their own business.
If they can build a business that first of all helps them self to get a better life, and at the same time maybe in somes cases also can employ people, that will hopefully give a good and healthy energy in the local communitys where these entrepreneur lives.
Education is also a very important part of the development of many countrys and communitys in the future.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I wish to contribute to people and communities that strive to realize their untapped potential.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to design and implement technology and related business processes that support efficient customer service operations (example: Call Centre systems)

lender.name: Linnea
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I thought it would help others.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked for a few non-profits. I help raise money so that organizations can exist and help the community.

lender.name: Kaisa
lender.loan_because: Everything is fine in my life: I have two lovely sons, a home, a regular job, food, water...All that is a good reason to me to help other women all over the world. IÂ´m proud to be a member of the team "Teachers for Change".

lender.name: matis
lender.loan_because: i want to share what i have

lender.name: Debra & Spencer
lender.loan_because: We hope to make a difference in somone's life, and inspire others to do the same. This is our way of paying it forward and being grateful for the abundance in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to support women all over the world to become independent and strong

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: Grandma says I don't need the money yet.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I play and eat and sleep.

lender.name: Ole
lender.loan_because: It feels so good :-)

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people throughout the world thrive rather than survive.
lender.occupational_info: I aid organizations that support health and healing for youth.

lender.name: Windsor Humanist Society
lender.loan_because: As humanists we try to minimize the inequities of circumstance and ability - we support a more just distribution of nature's resources and the fruits of human effort so that as many as possible can enjoy a good life. Human challenges can best be addressed by human beings and not by reliance on supernatural entities or dogma.
lender.occupational_info: We aim for the full development of every human being & affirm the dignity of those sharing this planet with us.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I have plenty to be thankful for and would like to help others who are not so fortunate.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: This is a great way of supporting communities in developing countries. I have a particular interest in Sierra Leone
lender.occupational_info: I run a charity in the UK

lender.name: cara
lender.loan_because: I think this is truly a worthwhile program. My parents had small businesses that helped put me through college. Someone took a chance on them at one point to get them started. There is truly something special and motivating about taking a risk to help someone that you've never even met as well. Don't we want we truly want a world where everyone is happy and successful at what they do? I think so...even if it means a small financial push to get someone going.
lender.occupational_info: I teach primary age students. This is seven and eight year olds. I work in a public school.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It makes an impact!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the university of new mexico, I work part time, and I'm a midshipman in the US Navy

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I have the great pleasure of helping others to get a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I make education statistics

lender.name: Mickey
lender.occupational_info: I'm a political science and international relations student at West Virginia University.

lender.name: Trudy
lender.loan_because: I received a gift and wanted to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother and know how hard it is to raise a family.

lender.name: OHS Class of 2010
lender.loan_because: We the students of Mr. Woodâs first hour US History class, would like to take our hard working money and donate it to less fortunate people. As soon as Mr.Wood told us about KIVA we were ready to do whatever it took to help as many people as possible. KIVA touched us as a class. Instead of thinking about ourselves, we are trying to think of others. Instead of taking, we are giving. The children of today are the leaders of tomorrow. It feels so good to donate and to know that you are actually doing something to help others. We are standing up NOW and taking control. KIVA is a wonderful site and is doing a wonderful job.
lender.occupational_info: Students taking a stand in the real world. We are people who care about others and want to make a difference.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me a great opportunity to help others who may not have the financial means but do have the aptitude and the ability to improve their situation through their hard work.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to help create opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a high school teaching math classes for students with learning difficulties.

lender.name: Peggy en Paul
lender.loan_because: it gives us great satisfaction to help people all around the world .

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I'm amazed and happy that such a small amount can help somebody.

lender.name: Marlies
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to most of the people in this world.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: This way I feel certain, that the whole amount goes to the stated purpose and not to administration in a NGO-organisation

lender.name: Helena & Michael
lender.loan_because: We would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Logistics for a major insurancecompany / Development of medical devices

lender.name: Dave Terpstra
lender.loan_because: I get to see firsthand the impact it makes.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant to church and business leaders in southern Africa.

lender.name: Tara Jo
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to give out of the abundance I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I support leaders (business leaders, family leaders, political leaders, etc.) by freeing up their time to do what they do best.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic possibility to help others help themselves. It is a great pleasure to accomplish ones goals. I wish all the best for all KIVA's entrepreneurs and their businesses.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans can have long-term, positive impact in people's lives

lender.name: John&Marian
lender.loan_because: I want other families to have the opportunity to earn a good income in their country. The stories and this process is inspiring and it blesses our family in return.
lender.occupational_info: John works on television shows and movies and Marian helps teenagers.

lender.name: Kristian T.
lender.loan_because: It really can make a difference...

lender.name: Alexander, Pia & Paul
lender.loan_because: It enables people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Our family consists of our son who is in daycare, my husband who works in IT and myself, I work as a Personal Assistant.

lender.name: Yvi
lender.loan_because: "We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee." Marian Wright Edelman Lobbyist on Behalf of Children

lender.name: Tedie
lender.loan_because: I loan to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I was given a certificate to danate to KIVA as a birthday gift. I donated to a woman who is making her business related to sewing, because I also sew
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered Nurse and work in the Emergency Room. It is busy, but in a very different way I'm sure your hospitals are

lender.name: Timo
lender.loan_because: I want to help women make the world a better place.

lender.name: Moira
lender.loan_because: I believe in Ubuntu.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others with the materials and resources to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Teach For America, working to eliminate the achievement gap in the United States, in order to provide all children with the opportunity to attain an excellent education.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. I want to share with entrepreneurs all over the world.

lender.name: Yoc Lan
lender.loan_because: Money makes money, that's a fact. I want to share mine, to help people and make their lives better. It's only a little step for me, but a huge step forward for the people who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance television director.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lender.name: GossG
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day. Teach a man to fish? He already knows. Give him a line and a hook, and he feeds his village for life.
lender.occupational_info: I was a programmer for the big computers of the 60's, 70's and 80's. Modern computers are different. So I surrendered that career and am starting over agiain, learning to be an investment analyst.
